meanings.definition: A form of sports betting in which the bettor predicts the first and second place finishers in a race or competition.
meanings.sent1: In the quiniela, you have to guess both the first and second winners of the race.
meanings.sent2: She placed a bet on the quiniela for the upcoming horse race.
meanings.sent3: Trying to predict the quiniela results felt like solving a fun puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The quiniela is like foreseeing the future of the race.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the quiniela is in the challenge of predicting the winners.

meanings.definition: A type of lottery in which participants select a set of numbers to match those drawn in a specific order.
meanings.sent1: The quiniela requires choosing numbers in a particular sequence.
meanings.sent2: Winning the quiniela jackpot can be life-changing.
meanings.sent3: Picking the quiniela numbers felt like cracking a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The quiniela is a game of chance where order matters.
meanings.sent5: Matching the quiniela numbers exactly is rare and thrilling.
